name: Ecosophy //03: ´Cyclic´
description:
Source: RED Epic Mysterium-X 5k
2048px X 858px Scope 2.39 version.
Format: 60fps HFR base frame.
Lens: Schneider Xenon FF primes.
Location: Gye, Ecuador.

Ecosophy of humanity.

Everything we do, everything we are, are images that were once actualized in an event, and will continue to navigate through depths of virtuality. We will try to avoid them, kill them, but like in a vision we become entangled with them. They don´t disappear.

We are what we have done, do and will do; all at the same qualitative time. Our own decisions are the engagements, the qualities with which we entangle throughout life. There is no escape from this. The uselessness of the lie denies ourselves before anything else. Negates the facts, and therefore, what we are. The first person to be lied to is oneself, the worst lie we can resort is to forget ourselves.

Singularity as a detained space. The more fearful own consequences might become, the stronger the instinct of survival. “I is another” when on the other side of singularity, we get a little more objective at the same time.

65% of earnings to Haiti cause.
